short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CryptoChecker Tool allows you to highlight a number and check the conversion Bitcoin value into USD currency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The CryptoChecker Tool is a Google Chrome Extension that allows you to highlight a number and check the conversion Bitcoin value into FIAT USD currency.

This extension includes:
- Highlight a number - Context Menu Fiat USD Converter
- Information Icon - displays Bitcoin price in real-time
- Bitcoin to Fiat USD instant converter
